name: Youtube Prompts Library
description: The "YouTube Prompts Library" Notion template is a go-to tool for YouTube creators looking for instant inspiration. Unlike a blank slate, this template comes pre-loaded with a variety of carefully curated prompts to fuel your content pipeline.Whether you’re stuck in a creative rut or just need a quick idea for your next upload, this resource delivers a starting point you can use right away.Inside, you’ll find prompts spanning different niches, styles, and trends—think engaging titles, unique vid
